column2: "Nna motɔɔ abɔdo dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n’asɛm tse
"Na EWURADZE n’asɛm baa mo hɔ otsia ebien no dɛ
column4: "Fa abɔdo a atɔ abɔ w’asen no
column7: na fa kosuma ɔbotan no no tokur bi mu."

column4: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ me no."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ nda pii ekyir no
column6: na keyi abɔdo a mehyɛɛ wo dɛ fa kosuma hɔ no fi hɔ."

column4: na miyii abɔdo no fii beebi mbrɛ medze sumae no: na

column6: Dɛm yi ara na mibesi masɛɛ Juda ne ntsɛn
column7: na Jerusalɛm ne ntsɛn beberebe no."

column2: "Ɔman bɔn yi a wɔpow dɛ wobetsie me nsɛm
column3: wɔnantsew hɔn akoma ne ntsintsiman mu na woekedzi enyame afofor ekyir
column6: wɔbɛyɛ dɛ abɔdo yi ara a onnye mma hwee no."

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ abɔdo fam nyimpa n’asen no
column3: dɛmara na mama Israelmba nyina na Judamba nyina afam mo ho nye no
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse; ama wɔaayɛ me ɔman
column7: na enyimnyam: naaso wɔammpɛ dɛ wotsie."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ka asɛm yi kyerɛ hɔn: Mbrɛ EWURADZE
column4: Nsatoa biara wɔbɛhyɛ no nsa ma: na wɔbɛse wo dɛ
column5: Ana innyim dɛ nsatoa biara wɔbɛhyɛ no nsa ma?"

column2: "Ɔno na wo so se hɔn dɛ
column5: mebɛma asaase yi do mba nyinara
column6: mekyerɛ ahemfo a wɔtsetse David akɔngua do
eso minnkenya ayamuhyehye dɛ mennkɛsɛɛ hɔn."

column3: na hom nyɛ aso; mma hom nnyɛ ntsɛntsɛn

column2: "Hom mfa enyimnyam mma EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn no
column4: ansaana hom anan efintsiw mbepɔw no do ewimbir; na ber a hom rohwehwɛ kan no

column3: me kra bosu nsumaa mu wɔ hom ntsɛn ntsi; na m’enyiwa bosu kɛse
column5: osiandɛ wɔafa EWURADZE no nguankuw no ndɔmmum."

column2: "Se ɔhen nye ɔhen ne na dɛ
column3: Hom mbrɛ hom ho adze bɔkɔɔ: na hom enyimnyam abɔtsir no efi hom tsir ho egu famu."
na obi nnyi hɔ a obuebue: woetu Juda manmu nyina ndɔmmum kɔ; woetu no kɔ ndɔmmum korakora."
na hom nhwɛ hɔn a wofi kwaamu afamu reba: wo mbowakuw a wɔdze kyɛɛ wo no wɔ hen

column2: "Sɛ ɔdze hɔn a ɔwoara akyerɛkyerɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnyɛ w’aboafo no dzi wo do panyin a
column3: ebɛn asɛm na ebɛka? Aso yaw nnkekitsa wo dɛ ɔbaa a ɔroko awoo?"
Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ndzɛmba iyinom aba mo do a? W’emumuyɛ ne kɛse ntsi wɔada w’asetar ho edzi
anaa ɔsebɔ bɛsesa no ho nsisii? Ɔno na hom a mbusubɔ akokwa hom yi hom botum ayɛ papa."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na mobɔbɔ hɔn apetse dɛ ntsɛw a sar do mframa ma otu kɔ."

column3: wo kyɛfa a mesusu ama wo
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse; osiandɛ wo werɛ efir me

column2: "Dɛm ntsi emi mara so mibeyi w’asetar ebua w’enyim na w’enyito bɛda edzi."

column5: wɔ haban mu akoko do. Jerusalɛm e due! Onkodu dabɛn na wo ho bɛtsew?"
